The oath to bee taken by all members of the Parliament 1641. and in all Parliaments hereafter, before they proceed to any act or determination. Scotland. Parliament.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed by James Bryson, Edinbvrgh, : 1641.
Initial. "Read in audience of Parliament who approveth the same, and appointeth the same to bee taken by all members of Parliament ..." Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
